title: The Blood Cloth Syndicate
description: A group of people forged in the fire of ancient Israel, the shadowy remnants of a French claim to power and one of the most controversial relics to ever exist. Brothers John and Jimmy have a big night planned with one of their childhood friends, but when they arrive at his house to find he is missing, their plans take an unexpected turn. Information they receive while visiting their grandfather, and last remaining relative in a nursing home, spurs the reunion of old friends who discover their relationships were not by chance.
author: Joseph Racconti
